name: TokyoTosho - Dark
description:
This is based off of Dark TokyoTosho style 13496 by user 14255.  Since it no longer works, I've fixed it and tweaked a few things I didn't like about it.

Makes the Tokyo Toshokan domains dark and easier on the eyes.  Font size has been adjusted slightly.  Mouse-over links have the overline.  In the Details pages, the seeders/leechers numbers are colored and bigger .  It now references all domains: .com, .info, .net, and .se (all include https, www2, and www3).  It should be of note that the .com domain is no longer in use.  I'll try to update if anything breaks, otherwise leave a comment/discussion via the button at the bottom of the page.  Tested with Stylish on Firefox, user script extension on Chrome, and javascript file on Opera.

Version with most elements hidden here: style 32030.

Full size Main page:
http://sadpanda.us/images/204500-TBFUW41.png

Full size Details page:
http://sadpanda.us/images/204501-WD75ESH.png
additional_info:
2013 Sep 02: Removed Flattr count (link to donate is still there), h3, Google Custom Search.
2013 Jan 03: Added support for the Google Custom Search.
2012 Jan 26: Fixed some light colored pixels in the magnet icon.
2011 Jun 20: Removed nukeDL links.
2010 Sep 01: There are 2 ads on the site: one above the main torrent listing and one below.  If you don't have Adblock Plus, these can be turned off in the site's Customize page.  Also updated screenshots.
2010 May 14: Didn't realize the Details pages changed slightly. Seeder/leecher colors have been fixed.
2010 Mar 26: TokyoTosho now has an option on its Customize/Settings page for an Inverse theme.  This userstyle will still be updated for those who like it better.
2010 Jan 23: Added Sweden domain (.se).  Updated screenshots.
2009 Dec 18: Restored anything that was previously hidden (top searches, redundant IRC link, notes, etc.).
